title: Australia, NZ dollars lose ground to yen; central bank chiefs due to speak
description:
By Stella Qiu

The Aussie and kiwi lost ground to the yen on Monday as hawkish hints from the Bank of Japan chief lifted the Japanese currency, although against the U.S. dollar they mostly drifted, having ended November largely flat.

title: Was housing the problem in Australia's 'surprising' economic check up?
description:

title: Soaring home prices erase benefits of recent interest rate cuts
description:

title: In November, the annual TD-MI Inflation Gauge in Australia increased from 3.1% to 3.2%
description:
Australia’s TD-MI Inflation Gauge increased in November, rising from 3.1% to 3.2%. This change may affect future monetary policy decisions by the Reserve Bank of Australia. The gauge is an indicator of inflation trends, reflecting the cost of goods and services, and impacts economic sentiment.

title: Australia's Unemployment Rate Drops in October
description:
MT Newswires -Shutterstock

Employment in Australia grew stronger in October as the jobless rate reverted to a decline, lessening chances of a near-term rate cut.
